name: Opulentus Overseas Careers
overview:
Opulentus Overseas Careers Is India’s only SUPER VISA SPECIALIST providing quality solutions in visa processing . We are expertise in providing all kinds of visas ranging from Student Visas to Immigration Visas. We also offer Job assistance services for the people who were interested to Work and Settle in Abroad. 

     Our Post Landing services will be an added advantage in your new country as we&#8217;ll provide you with job search services, pick up assistance and accommodation assistance. We&#8217;ll be there for you till you are permanently settled in the country.

So whether you are a student wanting to study abroad or a business man willing to start work abroad or a visitor wishing to go on a holiday abroad; Opulentus Overseas Careers is the gateway to abroad for you.

offices.address2: # 567, Road No.19, Near Aircel, Jubilee Hills
